DOC.brief_title: A Two Comparator , Controlled Phase 3 Study Patients With Without Evaporative Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: Able read comprehend English give inform consent demonstrate signing record inform consent ; Over 18 year age ; Not wear contact lenses past 3 month enrol Willing use eye drop comply study visit schedule direct Investigator ; Habitual ( correct uncorrected ) visual acuity 6/9.5 good eye ; At Screening visit ( Day 14 ) , patient must Ocular Surface Disease Index ( OSDI ) score > 18 ( 0 100 scale ) . At Baseline ( Day 1 ) visit , patient must OSDI score > 12 continue study . TBUT≤10sec least 1 eye Screening visit Baseline visit Corneal sodium fluorescein stain score ≥ 1 < 4 ( Oxford scheme ) Screening Baseline visit . Schirmer test ( anesthesia ) ≤ 2 mm either eye Screening Patients currently use topical ocular medication use topical ocular medication within 2 week Screening visit . Patients treat bilaterally market artificial tear dry eye consider , provide discontinue use Screening visit ; Any active anterior segment disease exclude blepharitis ; Any systemic disease may affect ocular health e.g . Graves disease , autoimmune disease ankylose spondylitis , multiple sclerosis systemic lupus erythematosus ; History epilepsy migraine exacerbate flashing , strobelike light ; Rigid soft contact lens wearer , include orthokeratology ; History eye surgery within 6 month prior enrolment study ; Previous corneal refractive surgery
